file_insights.purpose: Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) content validation module

patterns_discovered.description: Implementation uses weighted dictionary for different validation criteria (20% clear answer, 15% headers, 15% FAQ, etc.)
Extensive use of regex patterns for definitive language detection, weak language detection, header structure, and FAQ format validation
All validation methods return consistent dictionary structures with 'passed', 'score', 'reason', and additional metadata
Multi-faceted approach analyzing: clarity, structure, format, language quality, brand presence, quotability, and information hierarchy
Integration with logging_config throughout validation lifecycle

gotchas_discovered.issue: Pattern r'\nguarantees\b' has incorrect escape - should be r'\bguarantees\b' (uses \n instead of \b at start)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Pattern will not match 'guarantees' at beginning of words, only after newlines

gotchas_discovered.issue: Diff is truncated at character position with incomplete code visible
gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot verify implementation completeness - methods appear cut off mid-implementation

gotchas_discovered.issue: Brand names are hardcoded as class constant, limiting flexibility for multiple brands or dynamic configuration
gotchas_discovered.impact: Requires code modification to check different brands

gotchas_discovered.issue: Comment indicates query term extraction implementation but is truncated
gotchas_discovered.impact: Target query matching functionality may be incomplete

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created comprehensive AEO validation module with 8 distinct validation checks
approach_outcome.completeness_assessment: Partial - diff appears truncated but core structure implemented
approach_outcome.code_quality: High - well-documented, typed, structured returns, logging integrated

recommendations.item: Fix regex pattern in DEFINITIVE_PATTERNS: change r'\nguarantees\b' to r'\bguarantees\b'
Externalize BRAND_NAMES to configuration file or environment variable for multi-brand support
Create unit tests for all 8 validation methods with edge cases and various content types
Add usage examples showing how to validate different content types (article, faq, guide, comparison)
Verify complete file implementation - diff is truncated and method completeness cannot be confirmed
Add caching for regex compilation to improve performance with large batches of content
Consider adding content segmentation analysis (e.g., breaking down into introduction, main points, conclusion)
